item.description:
Agenda:

4:00 Names.

At the April Meetup we will continue exercising our writing muscles.

Now that we've written a few exercises, let's try to take them a little further. Look over what you've got. Pick something short, a flash piece or a scene, that gets you excited or interested, even if you don't know where it's going.

If you don't have something, I'll bring a writing exercise to play with.

Bring writing implements. Pen & Paper, keyboard, whatever you feel freest with.

5:00 Break

Open Discussion.

6:00 Go Home and Write!

The Lincoln Street Cafe is at the Newton Highlands stop on the Green D Line, or the Lincoln Street stop for the 59 bus. Since it's small, there's an semi-official limit of 8 people. When more than that show up, the group tends to break into smaller groups and keep going.

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers April Meetup
